import warnings

source.7a92a261:
conditions = [
    (df['ANNUAL'] <= 800),
    (df['ANNUAL'] > 800) & (df['ANNUAL'] <= 2000),
    (df['ANNUAL'] > 2000) & (df['ANNUAL'] <= 4500),
    (df['ANNUAL'] > 4500)
    ]


values = ['low', 'medium', 'high', 'very_high']

df['status'] = np.select(conditions, values)
df
